notes: 1152p thumbnails are thumbnails which sizes are 2048x1152, which is the highest 16:9 resolution supported by Twitch thumbnails, and highest resolution is 2048x2048
If overwrite_files is set to true, files that already exist will be overwritten, but the data might not always be the same as before, use with caution
If use_get_twitch_video_thumbnail is set to false, thumbnails will never be downloaded
